issue.title: Add Graphistry to Arrow JS proof points
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1911](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1911). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
As part of upcoming publicity to the JS project, we wanted to add the Graphistry enterprise-grade use case to the homepage.

comments.body:
